items.headline: General Motors takes $7.2 billion charge on EV shift as it boosts dividend and sets new buyback
items.summary_en: General Motors on Tuesday said it took a $7.2 billion charge as it adjusts to declining customer interest in electric vehicles as the automaker boosted its dividend and announced a new stock buyback.
